text.headline:
Data Science Journey
Timeline
text.text: My professional and academic journey in Data Science

text.headline: ML Engineer Intern at SF Technology
text.text: Enhanced warehouse automation by refining object detection models with TensorFlow and augmenting edge-case images using OpenCV, reducing misclassifications by 10%.

text.headline: MS in Data Science - Columbia University
text.text: Master's degree in Data Science focusing on machine learning, statistical modeling, and data visualization techniques.

text.headline: Business Intelligence Analyst at ADEL
text.text: Built forecasting models using XGBoost to analyze financial trends and regional demand signals, supporting improved inventory planning across Southeast Asia.

text.headline: NBERT-Powered News Sentiment Explorer
text.text: Sentiment Analysis of New York Times Articles using advanced NLP techniques and machine learning models.

text.headline: R Shiny Wildlife Habitat Dashboard
text.text: Interactive Wildlife Habitat Dataviz Dashboard built with R Shiny for data exploration and visualization.

text.headline: Data Scientist Lead at GradeMate
text.text: Leading ML model deployment with LLaMA 3 and Python to automate grading workflows, reducing manual variance and increasing efficiency for educators.
